trans-unit.source: Cortana Analytics Solution Template Playbook for predictive maintenance in aerospace and other businesses
trans-unit.target: Cortana Analytics Solution Template Playbook for predictive maintenance in aerospace and other businesses

trans-unit.source: Executive summary
trans-unit.target: Executive summary

trans-unit.source: Predictive maintenance is one of the most demanded applications of predictive analytics with unarguable benefits including tremendous amount of cost savings.
trans-unit.target: Predictive maintenance is one of the most demanded applications of predictive analytics with unarguable benefits including tremendous amount of cost savings.

trans-unit.source: This playbook aims at providing a reference for predictive maintenance solutions with the emphasis on major use cases.
trans-unit.target: This playbook aims at providing a reference for predictive maintenance solutions with the emphasis on major use cases.

trans-unit.source: It is prepared to give the reader an understanding of the most common business scenarios of predictive maintenance, challenges of qualifying business problems for such solutions, data required to solve these business problems, predictive modeling techniques to build solutions using such data and best practices with sample solution architectures.
trans-unit.target: It is prepared to give the reader an understanding of the most common business scenarios of predictive maintenance, challenges of qualifying business problems for such solutions, data required to solve these business problems, predictive modeling techniques to build solutions using such data and best practices with sample solution architectures.

trans-unit.source: It also describes the specifics of the predictive models developed such as feature engineering, model development and performance evaluation.
trans-unit.target: It also describes the specifics of the predictive models developed such as feature engineering, model development and performance evaluation.

trans-unit.source: In essence, this playbook brings together the business and analytical guidelines needed for a successful development and deployment of predictive maintenance solutions.
trans-unit.target: In essence, this playbook brings together the business and analytical guidelines needed for a successful development and deployment of predictive maintenance solutions.

trans-unit.source: These guidelines are prepared to help the audience create an initial solution using Cortana Analytics Suite and specifically Azure Machine Learning as a starting point in their long term predictive maintenance strategy.
trans-unit.target: These guidelines are prepared to help the audience create an initial solution using Cortana Analytics Suite and specifically Azure Machine Learning as a starting point in their long term predictive maintenance strategy.

trans-unit.source: The documentation regarding Cortana Analytics Suite and Azure Machine Learning can be found in [Cortana Analytics](http://www.microsoft.com/server-cloud/cortana-analytics-suite/overview.aspx) and [Azure Machine Learning](https://azure.microsoft.com/services/machine-learning/) pages.
trans-unit.target: The documentation regarding Cortana Analytics Suite and Azure Machine Learning can be found in [Cortana Analytics](http://www.microsoft.com/server-cloud/cortana-analytics-suite/overview.aspx) and [Azure Machine Learning](https://azure.microsoft.com/services/machine-learning/) pages.

trans-unit.source: There are three essential data sources we look for when qualifying a
trans-unit.target: There are three essential data sources we look for when qualifying a

trans-unit.source: business problem to be suitable for a predictive maintenance solution:
trans-unit.target: business problem to be suitable for a predictive maintenance solution:

trans-unit.source: Failure History: Typically, in predictive maintenance applications, failure events are very rare.
trans-unit.target: Failure History: Typically, in predictive maintenance applications, failure events are very rare.

trans-unit.source: However, when building predictive models that will predict failures, the algorithm needs to learn the normal operation pattern as well as the failure pattern through the training process.
trans-unit.target: However, when building predictive models that will predict failures, the algorithm needs to learn the normal operation pattern as well as the failure pattern through the training process.

trans-unit.source: Hence, it is essential that the training data contains sufficient number of examples in both categories in order to learn these two different patterns.
trans-unit.target: Hence, it is essential that the training data contains sufficient number of examples in both categories in order to learn these two different patterns.

trans-unit.source: For that reason, we require that data has sufficient number of failure events.
trans-unit.target: For that reason, we require that data has sufficient number of failure events.

trans-unit.source: Failure events can be found in maintenance records and parts replacement history or anomalies in the training data can also be used as failures as identified by the domain experts.
trans-unit.target: Failure events can be found in maintenance records and parts replacement history or anomalies in the training data can also be used as failures as identified by the domain experts.

trans-unit.source: Maintenance/Repair History: An essential source of data for predictive maintenance solutions is the detailed maintenance history of the asset containing information about the components replaced, preventive maintenance activates performed, etc. It is extremely important to capture these events as these will affect the degradation patterns and absence of this information will cause misleading results.
trans-unit.target: Maintenance/Repair History: An essential source of data for predictive maintenance solutions is the detailed maintenance history of the asset containing information about the components replaced, preventive maintenance activates performed, etc. It is extremely important to capture these events as these will affect the degradation patterns and absence of this information will cause misleading results.

trans-unit.source: Machine Conditions: In order to predict how many more days (hours, miles, transactions, etc.) a machine will last before it fails, we assume the machine’s health status will degrade over time during its operation.
trans-unit.target: Machine Conditions: In order to predict how many more days (hours, miles, transactions, etc.) a machine will last before it fails, we assume the machine’s health status will degrade over time during its operation.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, we expect the data to contain time-varying features that capture this aging pattern and any anomalies that will lead to degradation.
trans-unit.target: Therefore, we expect the data to contain time-varying features that capture this aging pattern and any anomalies that will lead to degradation.

trans-unit.source: In IoT applications, the telemetry data from different sensors represent one good example.
trans-unit.target: In IoT applications, the telemetry data from different sensors represent one good example.

trans-unit.source: In order to predict if a machine is going to fail within a time frame, ideally the data should capture degrading trend during this time frame before the actual failure event.
trans-unit.target: In order to predict if a machine is going to fail within a time frame, ideally the data should capture degrading trend during this time frame before the actual failure event.

trans-unit.target: Additionally, we require data that is directly related to the operating

trans-unit.source: The second one is to identify the likelihood of failure in a future period due to one of the multiple root causes.
